randomEventTags.name: Drought
randomEventTags.description: A drought has hit the island, causing food prices to rise.

randomEventTags.name: Bountiful Harvest
randomEventTags.description: A bountiful harvest has caused food prices to drop.

randomEventTags.name: Desert Caravan
randomEventTags.description: A large merchant caravan has arrived, increasing the supply of exotic goods.

randomEventTags.name: Market Fire
randomEventTags.description: A fire in the central market has destroyed some goods, reducing supply.

randomEventTags.name: High Tides
randomEventTags.description: Exceptionally high tides have made fishing more difficult, reducing seafood supply.

randomEventTags.name: Counterfeit Currency
randomEventTags.description: A counterfeit currency scandal has made merchants wary, increasing the price of valuable goods.

randomEventTags.name: Architect’s Commission
randomEventTags.description: A wealthy noble has ordered new buildings, raising demand for construction materials.

randomEventTags.name: Guild Regulation
randomEventTags.description: A trade guild has imposed new regulations, slightly raising the price of manufactured goods.

randomEventTags.name: Surplus Harvest
randomEventTags.description: An unusually good harvest has caused a surplus of grains and produce.

randomEventTags.name: Drunken Festival
randomEventTags.description: A local festival has driven up alcohol consumption and demand for entertainment goods.

randomEventTags.name: Storm at Sea
randomEventTags.description: A major storm has delayed merchant ships, reducing supply of imported goods.

randomEventTags.name: Plague Outbreak
randomEventTags.description: A minor plague outbreak has increased demand for medicinal supplies.

randomEventTags.name: Flooded Farmlands
randomEventTags.description: Heavy rains have flooded farmlands, causing crop shortages.

randomEventTags.name: Drought Conditions
randomEventTags.description: A lack of rain has caused water shortages, affecting agriculture and industry.

randomEventTags.name: Merchant Tax
randomEventTags.description: New government taxes on merchants have slightly increased trade costs.

randomEventTags.name: Black Market Surge
randomEventTags.description: Illegal trade has undercut official markets, reducing prices of certain goods.

randomEventTags.name: Mystic’s Prophecy
randomEventTags.description: A traveling mystic's prediction has caused panic buying of certain valuables.

randomEventTags.name: New Trade Agreement
randomEventTags.description: A treaty has opened up new trade routes, slightly increasing the supply of imports.

randomEventTags.name: Cattle Disease
randomEventTags.description: A livestock disease has reduced the supply of meat and leather.

randomEventTags.name: Mine Collapse
randomEventTags.description: A tragic mine collapse has decreased ore production, raising metal prices.

randomEventTags.name: Alchemy Breakthrough
randomEventTags.description: Alchemists have discovered a new refining method, slightly increasing production of rare goods.

randomEventTags.name: Theater Craze
randomEventTags.description: A popular play has driven up demand for fine clothing and entertainment goods.
